While in the AZ House of Reps, I led a bipartisan group that passed all-day Kindergarten. I've expanded on that work by joining my colleagues to intro the 1st ever bill in the US House of Reps to work toward universal access to full-day Kindergarten. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2YAAEfy

Today, I re-introduced the CHIME Act that extends the Community Health Centers Fund (CHCF) for 5 years & includes increases to ensure responsiveness to demands for care. CHCs are critical, esp. in #AZ01 rural areas, & we must ensure they are fully funded. http://bit.ly/2HINvHv

2018 marked the 4th consecutive year that our National Parks saw over 300 million visitors. Our public lands are a national treasure, & #AZ01 is proud to be home to some of the most beautiful natural areas in the US, including Grand Canyon National Park. http://bit.ly/2W5SpBB

The rising cost of prescriptions forces #AZ01 families to choose between medications & other necessities. I intro'd the Payment Commission Data Act, allowing health care experts complete access to drug pricing data as they make recommendations to Congress. http://bit.ly/2FdV0nq

Americans identifying as LGBTQIA deserve the same rights and protections under the law as anyone else. I cosponsored the Equality Act to prohibit discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation and identity in education, employment, and housing. #AZ01 https://nbcnews.to/2THEnsS

As a proud cosponsor of the Equal Rights Amendment in the House of Representatives, I'm troubled by this blocked vote in the Arizona Legislature. It is paramount that we ensure equal protection under the law for everyone, regardless of sex. #AZ01  http://bit.ly/2JgKBeJ

The contributions of the Navajo people to our armed forces and our nation are innumerable. I’m incredibly pleased that the Navy will be naming its new class of salvage and rescue ships in honor of the Navajo tribe. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2W7Pybn

My heart breaks for the victims of the senseless shootings at two mosques in Christchurch, and loved ones who must bear their loss. These violent attacks have no place in any community, least of all a place of worship. My prayers are with the people of Christchurch today. #AZ01
